abilities.desc: After you take damage, you gain 1 Iron token.
After you take damage from an enemy with your Challenge, you may Move 1.
abilities.trigger: after you take damage from an enemy with your challenge

actions.name: Is That All You Got?
actions.desc:
Challenge an enemy you can see. You gain 1 Iron token.
6+: Challenge another enemy you can see, then gain 2 Iron tokens and heal 2.
12+: Challenge a third enemy you can see, then give each of those enemies 3 Weakness tokens and Push 2.

actions.name: Not Good Enough
actions.desc:
Not Good Enough targets the enemy who held the Challenge Token you spent to pay for Not Good Enough. Give them 2 Weakness tokens.
Usable once per turn.
